sentence: In consideration of the functional parallels shared between M2-like macrophages in tumor tissues and the M2d phenotype, it has been posited that M2-like macrophages present at the tumor site could be identified as the M2d subtype[44], [50] (Fig. 1).
Additionally, TAMs secrete a range of cytokines, notably including IL-10 and TGF-β, which disrupt the functioning of normal immune effector cells (Fig. 2).

This paper aims to provide a comprehensive synthesis of recent studies, outlining the functions and underlying mechanisms of TAMs in various types of skin cancer, including CM, BCC, cSCC, MCC, and extramammary Paget's disease (EMPD) (Fig. 3).

Recognising this, the therapeutic strategy of reprogramming TAMs from immunosuppressive M2-like macrophages to M1-like macrophages has emerged, capitalising on the inherent plasticity of TAMs (Fig. 4).
